text:
@kanyewest AGAIN, multi-millionaires and billionaires being ok with socialism, but only when it bails out capitalism! The balls of this POS! Sells $900 sneakers & wants struggling Americans to help him out? WTF is wrong with these ppl? #GovermentHandouts #Abuse
